data.title: Universities in Hong Kong: Latest News and Updates
data.meta_description: There are eight higher education institutes in Hong Kong funded by the University Grants Committee (UGC). There is also a number of self-funded institutions, including the Open University of Hong Kong, and public institutions such as the Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts.
data.text:
Yang Hongxia said she wants to change the existing resource-intensive process of training large language models into a decentralised, machine-learning paradigm.

HKU president Xiang Zhang had sought Kenneth Chen for the vice-president role, but the candidate’s HK$5 million yearly package was rejected.

Source says Kenneth Chen, who held Legco role since 2012, being considered for vice-presidency job, after previous incumbent sacked last December.

Education Bureau did not confirm such plans but says group will reveal its work results in due course.

Ill-fated ‘brand refresh’ may have cost Chinese University of Hong Kong some HK$4 million, but it paid a heavier price in the controversy that followed.

Clinical study involving more than 350 patients finds accuracy levels for artificial intelligence-based software are as high as 81 per cent.

The recruitment comes as the Hong Kong government makes efforts to transform the city into a technology hub by leveraging the research capabilities of its top universities.

Proposals by HKUST and Imperial College London may offer training in fields currently unavailable and come at a time when city needs more medical professionals.

Children with at least one bipolar parent are 7½ times more likely to develop social anxiety, an early sign of the condition, researchers say.

Readers discuss the path forward for students to whom the Jupas route to university is closed, and how schools can better cultivate student well-being.

School is third tertiary institution to announce move to increase number of medical students amid shortage of doctors.

Stop masking true scale of budget deficits with bond proceeds. Hongkongers are not stupid. They know the government must balance the books.
